text: "U Don't Have to Call" is a song by American singer Usher. It was released from his album 8701 (2001). It was the third single. It reached number three on the Billboard Hot 100 chart. It reached number four on the UK Singles Chart. The song won a Grammy Award for Best Male R&B; Vocal Performance in 2003. This became his second Grammy win. "U Don't Have to Call" became the last single from 8701. The song sold 4 million copies in the United States. The music video was filmed in Los Angeles at the Westin Bonaventure Hotel.
